0.text: Sauraren karar ya tabbatar da ranar da hakkin wanda ake zargi, na samun shari’a cikin gaggawa.

1.text: yau da sassafe, gudun iska ya kai saurin kilomita 83 a awa guda, amma dai ana tsammanin zai yi ta raguwa.

2.text: Babban mahimmin tsarin magudanar jini shine zuciya, wacce ke harba jini.

3.text: Waɗannan sassan yanar gizon sun ja ra’ayi sosai, musamman a ɓangaren ilimi.

4.text: Yawan bude ido cikin jama’a ya fi saukin kudi, don haka idan kai kadai ne ko kana tare da abokin tafiya daya, yi kokari ka hadu da sauran mutane domin hada kungiya na mutum hudu zuwa shidda domin samun farashi mai sauki.

5.text: Wasu matsakaika-girman kamarorin fim suna amfani da girma 6cm ta 6cm, mafi daidai a 56mm ta 56mm babu.

6.text: ka tabbatar ka ɗauka bugu na manufofinka da bayanan hulɗar mai inshorar tare da kai.

7.text: Cika gidanka da wadataccen kofi da safe da kuma shayin shakatawa mai kyau na dare.

8.text: Faduwar dusar kankara ba abu ne mara kyau ba; gangara na iya rikewar dusar kankara sosai, kuma yawancin kima za su sauko kamar faduwar dusar kankara.

9.text: Harajin kuɗin shiga an tsara su daban a cikin ƙasashe daban-daban, kuma ƙimar haraji da takunkumi sun bambanta sosai daga ƙasa zuwa ƙasa.

5.text: Wasu matsakaika-girman kamarorin fim suna amfani da girma 6cm ta 6cm, mafi daidai a 56mm ta 56mm babu.

6.text: ka tabbatar ka ɗauka bugu na manufofinka da bayanan hulɗar mai inshorar tare da kai.

7.text: Cika gidanka da wadataccen kofi da safe da kuma shayin shakatawa mai kyau na dare.

8.text: Faduwar dusar kankara ba abu ne mara kyau ba; gangara na iya rikewar dusar kankara sosai, kuma yawancin kima za su sauko kamar faduwar dusar kankara.

9.text: Harajin kuɗin shiga an tsara su daban a cikin ƙasashe daban-daban, kuma ƙimar haraji da takunkumi sun bambanta sosai daga ƙasa zuwa ƙasa.

0.text: Sauraren karar ya tabbatar da ranar da hakkin wanda ake zargi, na samun shari’a cikin gaggawa.

1.text: yau da sassafe, gudun iska ya kai saurin kilomita 83 a awa guda, amma dai ana tsammanin zai yi ta raguwa.
